review: The Fire TV Stick works identically as the Firebox on the television.  However, I was very disappointed with the extreme difficulty I had trying to remove the back cover of the remote to install the batteries. My husband was able to the following day when he returned home... I had to postpone my excitement until then. Another disappointment is not having the 'voice activation' for searching.  It has a very small 'toy-like' size and has a strange, light feel to it.
